data.market_trends: Current travel market trends indicate an increase in eco-tourism and cultural travel, with more visitors interested in sustainable practices and local connections.
data.consumer_behavior: Travelers exhibit stronger preferences for experiential travel, focusing on itinerary-based discovery rather than typical tourist attractions.
data.competitive_landscape: Guatemala competes with other Central American destinations but is distinguished by its rich Mayan history and stunning natural landscapes.
data.seasonal_factors: Seasonal trends indicate a spike in tourism during the dry season from November to April, with fluctuations during summer holidays.
